snippet.title: Galactic Civilizations IV - Beta 1 Trailer
snippet.description:
#strategygame #4x #spacegame
www.galciv4.com

This newest iteration in the series comes six years after the 3rd installment and makes dramatic and innovative game design changes, including multi-sector maps and character-based abstraction. We reduce micromanagement and improve customization options for your civilization through several new features, and the best news is: we’re only starting the beta, and there’s much more to come.
